<Meta title="Templates/Actions/Default Row Action" />

# Default Row Action

```jsx
const DefaultRowAction = props => {
	const {actionLink, action, selected, onSuccess, onError} = props;

	const actionModel = useContext(ResourceActionModelCtxt);

	useEffect(() => {
		if (action.onClick) {
			new Promise((resolve) => resolve(action))
				.then(action => action.onClick(selected))
				.then(onSuccess).catch(onError);

			return;
		}

		const {_links} = selected;

		const method = detectActionMethod(action);
		const actionUrl = R.defaultTo(actionLink)(actionModel.getActionLink(action, _links));

		actionUrl &&
		submitRequest(actionUrl, {}, method).then(onSuccess).catch(onError);

	}, [action, selected]);

	return null;
};
```
